original: Cittasampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: citta sampayuttam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na citta sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Cittasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: citta sampayuttam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na citta sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
